channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP HCM (SMART PAYE solution)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP HCM (SMART PAYE solution)

item.title: CVE-2023-49577|2024-08-02T22:01:25.526Z -- sap_se -- sap%20hcm%20%28smart%20paye%20solution%29
item.description: The SAP HCM (SMART PAYE solution) - versions S4HCMCIE 100, SAP_HRCIE 600, SAP_HRCIE 604, SAP_HRCIE 608, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. After successful exploitation, an attacker can cause limited impact on confidentiality and integrity of the application.
